name: Tetrominal Space
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam.

Your objective is to orbit around the sun. If you get too close, you'll loose, but if you exit the orbit you'll also loose. You orbit is unstable, so you'll have to stabilize it. Try to survive as long as possible.

How to play:

use the mouse to click on the thrusters. The thrusters will then allow you to move the space station around.
